meanings.definition: A person who loves or admires Greece and its culture.
meanings.sent1: Many philhellenes visit Greece to immerse themselves in its rich history.
meanings.sent2: The philhellenes in our group were excited to explore ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The philhellenes at the Greek festival couldn't stop talking about their favorite myths.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for Greek art made her a true philhellene.
meanings.sent5: The philhellenes' enthusiasm for Greek cuisine was contagious.
